sentences.english: I'm confused. Should I go to an optometrist or ophthalmologist for my eye exam?
sentences.chinese: 我应该看验光师还是眼科医师，作眼镜查抄时？

sentences.english: The optician says that my vision is perfect.
sentences.chinese: 验光师说我的视力非常好。

sentences.english: You were still at your optometrist appointment.
sentences.chinese: 你仍旧在你验光师约见的地方。

sentences.english: You will help recruit the best optometrists for our new stores;
sentences.chinese: 您将协助我们的新店招募优秀，专业的验光师。

sentences.english: A comprehensive optometric examination will include testing for astigmatism.
sentences.chinese: 综合电脑验光检测包括了对散光的检测。

sentences.english: To examine visual function with synthetical optometry and synoptophore.
sentences.chinese: 综合验光仪验先并用同视机法测定视功能。
验光师拥有绝对的选择权。

sentences.english: So he decides to go into town to see if he can find an optometrist.
sentences.chinese: 于是，他决议进入镇看到，假如他能找到一个验光师。

sentences.english: Imported lenses, computer optometry, immediate delivery.
sentences.chinese: 进口镜片，电脑验光，立等可取。

sentences.english: Plus, your pirate optometrist supplied the men with eye patches.
sentences.chinese: 并且，你的海盗验光配镜师为海盗们提供眼罩。

sentences.english: An optician is qualified to examine your eyes and prescribe glasses.
sentences.chinese: 验光师有资格检查你的眼睛及配眼镜。

sentences.english: Please wait a moment and our optometrist will be ready to see you.
sentences.chinese: 请等一下，我们的验光师马上就来看你。

sentences.english: The design method of wavefront corneal contact lens by the objective optometry is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种客观验光的波前角膜接触镜的设计方法。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the variation of dioptric state in the process of medicinal optometry to myope .
sentences.chinese: 目的观察近视眼验光中屈光状态的变化。

sentences.english: She only wears gltest to read.
sentences.chinese: 眼睛验光师她惟有看书时才戴眼镜。

sentences.english: They go on to work in labs under the direction of ophthalmologists and optometrists.
sentences.chinese: 学生将来在眼科医生和验光师的指导在实验室工作。

definition: to have a pair of prescription glasses made
number of degrees/reading (on a meter)/strength (alcohol, lenses etc)
